item_name: Body & Face Mineral Sunscreen - Little Hands Hawaii
ingredients: INGREDIENTS  Active: Non-Nano Zinc Oxide  Inactive: Organic Sunflower Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil, Kokum Butter, Local Beeswax, Vitamin E Oil, and Frankincense Essential Oil.    APPLICATION  Apply body and face sunscreen liberally to all exposed skin before sun exposure, which can be rubbed in to reduce whitening. Re-apply after 80min or after sunscreen is rubbed off, after toweling off or sweating.  *A little goes a long way    Please note that tinted products can stain clothing if not spot treated before washing. It is best to treat them like a foundation.
